name: Nasi Uduk Ibu Risa
description:
Nasi Uduk Ibu Risa is a food preparation game where we have to prepare nasi uduk for all customers. How many plates of nasi uduk can you serve before the time runs out? Download now!

This version is still the prototype for windows operating system. Some of the game assets are still place holder.

This game is released as an open beta for testing. This game is produced to promote nasi uduk to an international scale so that Indonesian culture is more well known by other countries. We will gather feedback from players via social media to improve this game before publishing it in the international market.

I'm (Jessica Andrian) working as the programmer of this project, alongside with 2 of my friends :

William Huang as game designer and Noverina Sari as game artist
